TEXT.TITLE: SALLIE MAE ADJUSTS SHORT-TERM DISCOUNT NOTE RATES
TEXT.BODY: The Student Loan Marketing Association said its rates on short-term discount notes were as follows: MATURITY NEW RATE OLD RATE MATURITY 5-14 days 5.75 pct 5.65 pct 5-14 days 15-85 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 15-78 days 86-91 days 5.80 pct 5.83 pct 79-85 days 92-176 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 89-360 days 177-183 days 5.83 pct 184-360 days 5.00 pct Reuter
